body.name: Rfiver Universal Floor Speaker Stands for Surround Sound, Heavy Duty 28 Inch Bookshelf Speaker Stands Each Holds 22lbs, Floorstanding Shelf Speaker Stand Built-in Cable Management, Black, 1 Pair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Perfect Fit for Your Speakers】 -Rfiver's speaker stand system is designed to seamlessly match your daily audio experience. It's universally compatible with popular speaker brands like Klipsch, Sony, Bose, Vizio, Samsung, Yamaha, Edifier, Polk, etc. The square glass top plate, measuring 7.8", comes equipped with rubber pads to offer the stability to your speaker.

【Rock-solid Stability & Surface Protection】-Our floor speaker stands crafted from premium alloy steel and an 11.81" glass base, offer the stability to your speaker. You can choose from two types of foot pads (metal feet and rubber feet) to ensuring your cherished carpet or floor without scratches and provide more stability. Strong Construction ensures support for speaker weighing up to 22 lbs, while other stands can only handle a fraction of that weight, capping at 11 lbs.

【Easy Assembly in 15 Minutes】-We've simplified the assembly process for you. Our monitor speaker stands includes all the necessary components and detailed installation instructions. Unlike similar speakers stand, we've simplified the assembly process by eliminating complex height adjustment modules. Just follow the instructions, tighten a few screws, you can effortlessly complete the assembly.

【Elegant Design & Wire Management】-Our heavy duty speaker stands boasts a sleek design that blends with any decor style. Whether your home is modern or classic, or if you're considering placement in the living room, bedroom, music room, or even outdoors, our product harmonizes beautifully in any setting. Our monitor speaker stand feature a 27" pole with two large holes (1.6" H x 0.8" W), allowing you to thread your speaker wires cleanly and keep them in order. Say goodbye to messy wires!

【5 Years Worry-Free Warranty】-To ensure your satisfaction, all of Rfiver products are guaranteed by 5-year manufacturer warranty. And our local customer service team is prepared to answer any of your questions and solve your problems with prompt reply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you still struggling with where to place your speakers? Looking to enhance your audiovisual experience? Our speaker stands are the perfect solution. Elevate your speakers to ear level height for an improved audio experience. Their design seamlessly complements any decor, whether placed in the living room, bedroom, music studio, or elsewhere. Our speaker stands effortlessly blend into any environment. Moreover, our speaker stand can efficiently manage your cables, concealing them neatly, creating a tidy living space. Don't wait any longer, experience breathtaking audiovisuals with our speaker stands.

Rubber Pads The square glass top plate, measuring 7.8", comes equipped with rubber pads to offer the stability to your speaker. Wire Management Our universal speaker stand feature a 27" pole with two large holes (1.6" H x 0.8" W), allowing you to thread your speaker wires cleanly and keep them in order. Excellent Material Strong Construction ensures support for speaker weighing up to 22 lbs, while other stands can only handle a fraction of that weight, capping at 11 lbs. Two Foot Pads You can choose from two types of foot pads (metal feet and rubber feet) to ensuring your cherished carpet or floor without scratches and provide more stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect speaker stands
reviews.reviewText: Everything about these speaker stands is perfect.....perfect height, stable, easy to assemble and adds another dimension to the aesthetic of my living room. I'm thoroughly happy with my choice of speaker stands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together look very nice and high endShipping was off I bought six and two came then a week later others came but I had already mounted the speakers on the wall by then

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Seem stable once assembled. Certainly cheaper than the competition. Holding Edifier speakers. As with all of this style, not stable if you run into them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent speaker stands. Happy with the quality.
reviews.reviewText: For the cost, these speaker stands are very good. It took me approximately a1/2 hour to set them up. I like the top and bottom glass plates. They look attractive and are functional adding weight for stability. I have QAcoustics M20 powered speakers that weigh 12 lbs. each. They sit well on the top plate and feel relatively secure. Given the cost, I can recommend these for your book shelf speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker stands.
reviews.reviewText: These are a perfect fit for my JBL 52 bookshelf speakers. Easy to assemble, with black glass base and top platform. It’s like the weee made for the JBL speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Speaker Stands
reviews.reviewText: These speaker stands look great and are sturdy. It's hard to justify spending hundreds of dollars for speaker stands. Buy these stands and put the savings into better speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good looks and will work for me
reviews.reviewText: My B&W 805's have been in cold storage for several years due to life changes. I'm finally in a place where I can get them back out and enjoy them. I got rid of the speaker stands I used to use long ago, so when these 28-inch stands from Rfiver came along I figured I'd give them a try.Inside the box you'll find all the pieces you'll need to build two stands, along with a useless wrench for assembly. Do yourself a favor and ditch that wrench and use your own 12mm and 14mm wrenches. The stand is made of two glass platforms that are finished to look like marble on the top faces and for whatever reason are pink on the bottom faces. The white connecting pole is in two pieces and hides a pair of threaded rods that secure all the pieces together. The collar between the poles and the escutcheon at the bottom are silver-finished plastic. Rfiver includes some sticky 3M bumpers to help keep your speakers in place in case you bump them while they're sitting on the slippery top plate.You can hide your speaker cables in the connecting poles, except I can't because the opening isn't big enough for a big shell on my Impeto IMP-2208 cables. No worries, I'll just use them outside the stands.I chose the rubber feet to cover the pegs on the base plates because I'm on a laminate wood floor. You could choose to use the included spikes if you wish.Even with the glass plates and steel tubes these stands are not very heavy, so if you're really worried about vibration you may want to get something you can fill with sand or shot. I'm not worried about that, and since I'm on the second floor it doesn't much matter anyway. There's going to be vibration whether I want it or not.The 28-inch height puts the tweeters at a good position for my listening chair, which doubles as my office chair. Maybe someday I'll get a dedicated listing room, but not yet!This product is made in China.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite Nice For The Money
reviews.reviewText: No problems at all with these speaker stands. Just as advertised, easy to assemble and actually pretty nice considering the price point. I’m very happy with them.
